nodes.text: Nogba Quush was a Kadas'sa'Nikto male criminal who operated within the Ivax Syndicate during Imperial Governor Ubrik Adelhard's Iron Blockade of the Anoat sector. Nogba worked with The Smuggler to eliminate mutual enemies for a time. Later in Cloud City on the planet Bespin, Quush introduced The Smuggler and Riley to Voras the Hutt after their discovery of the death of Emperor Palpatine.
